page.title: 04THE GREENFIELD VALLEY
page.content: The Greenfield Valley{Heritage Park links the town with the historic Basingwerk Abbey.Visitors can follow the picturesque{trail}through wooded walks,pass peaceful reservoirs and linger amongst the remains of the Valley's industrial past.Guided tours are available around the Copper and Cotton industries that once thrived there.Within the{Abbey Farm Agricult- {ural Museum,}visitors can examine a large collection of old farm tools in a traditional farm setting,see a growing collection of animals,weekend craft demonstrations and a film show describing the{history of the Valley through the Industrial Revolution to the tranquil Valley of today.A rich variety of wildlife can be observed and{numerous reservoirs}provide facilities for fishing,watersports and relaxation for the whole family.
